Chapter 400 Flicking the sleeves

"The fire element is changing, it's not good that the enemy is releasing a forbidden spell, spread out!"

As soon as the white-haired old man finished speaking, everyone in the Holy See, who gathered together to defend, scattered and fled like frightened birds.

The expected forbidden spell did not fall, but because the team was scattered, Bear Stearns could take advantage of it, and the victims kept getting +1+1+1...

Realizing that they have been fooled, everyone is helpless.

This is a conspiracy. Maxim was able to control the forbidden curse freely, if they didn't avoid it, what fell would be the real forbidden curse.

Resisting the forbidden curse with their small bodies, ninety-nine out of ten will end up in ashes, and there is a one percent chance of leaving a little wreckage.

If you choose to dodge, the original defensive formation will be gone. In the face of Bear Stearns' sneak attack, if he was prepared, the eighth-rank paladin could still make two moves, and the rest would be in a tragedy.

The disparity in strength is too great. No matter how well prepared you are, you can't stop the strong in the sanctuary from launching a sneak attack!

Especially magicians are the worst. Even the eighth-level great magister, once Bear Stearns gets close, there is no room for struggle.

The giant dragon attracts everyone's attention in front, and the earth bear plays a sneak attack from behind. Such a golden combination directly made the Holy See and his party lose their temper.

Watching the continuous reduction of the team, and wanting to organize a counterattack, I don't know where to start.

Originally thought that the dragon knight Hudson would be a weakness, but unfortunately the dragon didn't play close combat with them, but just released magic harassment in the sky from a distance.

After advancing less than five kilometers, they were attacked seven times. The original team of more than 200 people has now been reduced by more than half.

Realizing the seriousness of the problem, Jerachic said with a gloomy face: "The gang of hypocritical nobles have the most reputation, and Hudson was able to lower his face and sneak attack, making it clear that he was not going to let us leave alive.

The gunfire has stopped, and the enemy's navy is outside. The evacuation plan we made earlier is no longer feasible.

Right now, the only way we can break out is to take shelter on the island first, and wait for the fog to cover the sea area again.

The target is too big for everyone to gather together, and it is easy to be targeted by the enemy. Then we spread out and live or die by luck.

As long as someone is alive, bring the news back, let..."

Before he finished speaking, he was interrupted by the meteorite rain falling from the sky.

"The enemy's sneak attack is coming again!"

As soon as this idea came to mind, Jerachich didn't hesitate any longer, and immediately ordered: "Separate and go!"

This order is very cruel, which means that most of the people in the team will die in the pursuit of the enemy.

But there is no way, instead of gathering together and being grinded to death by the enemy's sneak attacks round after round; it is better to disperse to hide and seek that glimmer of life.

Anyway, the ship is destroyed by the enemy, even if everyone gathers together, there is no way to evacuate Dulong Island.

Now I can only bet on my life, betting that after the fog covers this sea area again, there will be merchant ships straying into this place, creating a chance for them to leave.

Otherwise, they could only be trapped and starved to death on this isolated island.

The team fled in all directions, and indeed won a glimmer of life, but it also created an opportunity for Bear Stearns.

Originally, it could only be a sneak attack, but now it has directly become a chase. Flying separately in the face of disaster, you don't need to outperform the enemy, just outperform your companions is enough.

The white-haired old man running at the front of the team suddenly realized that something was wrong. He always felt that something was staring at him from his back. When he looked back, it was a giant dragon that was chasing him.

"Earl Hudson, I have something to discuss! Everyone is..."

Before the old man could finish speaking, the rain of fire had enveloped the sky, scaring him to dodge in a hurry.

It's a pity that everything was in vain. He escaped the magic attack, but he couldn't avoid Maxim's dragon wagging its tail.

The crispy skin attribute of the magician is exposed at this moment. Even if he propped up the magic shield, he still couldn't avoid the fate of being patted into flesh.

It was at the last moment before his death that the old man realized the problem.

Everyone has no grievances and no enmity, so many younger brothers along the way did not kill, and he was specifically caught and chased by him, obviously for the "glory scepter" in his hand.

It's a pity that it was too late for everyone to realize all this. If he had reacted earlier and thrown the artifact in his hand when he was running for his life, he would definitely not have died so quickly.

Putting away the scepter of glory, Hudson sighed. It's not that he's cruel and merciless, it's because things are too tricky, so I have to silence him!

When he took the Excalibur just now, he hadn't realized it yet. When the old man released the forbidden spell with the help of the staff, he realized that it was the legendary "Scepter of Glory".

"Holy Crown", "Scepter of Glory", and "Holy Sword of Light", the standard three-piece set of the Holy See's artifacts, unexpectedly two of them fell into his hands.

If this news gets out, there will never be peace in the Mountain Territory. Not only is the Holy See looking for trouble for him, but other forces in the mainland will also spy on him.

Looking at this Holy See squad, you can see how deep the real top power is, and it is simply not something he, a dragon knight, can parry.

For the sake of safety, the only way to kill them is to silence them. Hudson has already made up his mind, if he can't strangle all the Holy See and his party, then block the foggy sea area and prohibit ships from traveling this route.

This matter is obviously not something that he can accomplish alone. It is only possible to do it together with several nearby coastal nobles.

With Hudson's current status, it is not difficult to ask everyone to sell favors, but the difficulty is not to arouse suspicion from the outside world.

Human nature, the more you block it, the easier it is to arouse everyone's curiosity. The blockade of the route can only block the passing merchant ships, but it cannot stop these great nobles from sending people to explore.

There are two paths before Hudson:

First, carve up the two artifacts with the Dalton family and face the crisis together.

Just based on Hudson's understanding of Earl Pierce, he is not such a courageous person. What's more, artifacts are of no real significance to the Dalton family.

The political significance of the artifact is mainly to divide the legal system of the Holy See, which cannot be controlled by a large noble alone.

Both artifacts are of the light system, and at least two eighth-level practitioners of the light system must be found to be able to basically drive them.

Even if they gave the artifact to the Dalton family, they couldn't find anyone who could use it. For the Dalton family, keeping the artifact in their hands is purely a hot potato.

Second, throw one piece to the king, divert the firepower, and return some benefits by the way.

Anyway, the only people who knew that he had obtained the two artifacts were people from the Holy See. As long as these people are not allowed to leave alive, the outside world will not know that both artifacts are in his hands.

After all, it is a miracle that such a artifact can meet one. If you meet two people at once, no one will believe you when you tell them.

"Forget it, you can only gain if you give up!"

After hesitating for a moment, Hudson made a choice between the two artifacts. The "Scepter of Glory" can't be used at all, and the "Holy Sword of Light" can still be used to cut people.

On the surface, the sealed holy sword of light looks similar to his knight sword. Because of Maxim, no one dared to check his knight sword up close, and no one would notice if it was replaced.

A decision was made, and when Hudson wanted to catch a living person for questioning, Bear Stearns finished the work first.

Except for a few lucky ones who were hidden, the rest either became ghosts under the claws of bears, or died under the mouths of poisonous insects. If you want to get an answer from them, you may have to summon the undead.

Hudson does know a little bit of undead magic, but how could someone who has dealt with heresy for a long time be unprepared?

The holy water they carry with them greatly reduces the probability of turning them into undead. Even if the summoning is successful, most undead creatures cannot retain the memory of their lifetime.

Why the "Battle of Glory" and "Holy Sword of Light" appeared here has become an unsolved mystery here in Hudson.

The high level of the Holy See must know, but it is impossible for him to ask. It is important to satisfy curiosity, but it is even more important to keep your life alive.

Putting down his inquisitive thoughts, he picked up the artifact and returned to the fleet, only to see a group of pirates gathered on the shore to surrender to the fleet.

Obviously, these guys who surrendered are smart people. Knowing that the people of the Holy See would not let them go, they decisively changed their followers.

It's just that they are in trouble at this moment. The fleet in front of them not only represents the Dalton family, but also the Koslow family.

The two companies can work together, but how to deal with these pirates needs to be decided after discussion.

Perhaps out of respect for the strong, the fleet just let the pirates stay on the shore, and did not immediately accept their surrender.

Glancing at the leader of the pirates resting on the shore, Hudson said indifferently: "I will give you a chance to survive and explain everything you know clearly.

Don't try to hide it, without our shelter, you can't survive a month on the island! "

Deep in his heart, Hudson has already begun to think about whether to silence this group of people together.

Pirates are pirates after all, even if they surrendered, Hudson can still find an excuse to kill them all, not to mention that they have not yet accepted their surrender.

"Don't worry, my lord, I will explain everything!

Originally, I was a down-and-out aristocrat in a small country in the middle of the country. Because of the decline of my family, I went out to find a living, and was later spotted by people from the Holy See.

Since then, according to their instructions, he has become a pirate and has been active in the south-central waters all year round.

I was chosen to go north to Dulong Island this time, mainly because I entered this place by mistake once when I was wandering in the mainland, and I survived and left.

The purpose of the Holy See's trip seems to be to find some artifact on the island. My status in the Holy See is very low, and that's all I know. "

After hearing Man Beard's answer, Hudson's killing intent subsided a bit. It doesn't matter if you don't know, but you're afraid of knowing too much.

No matter who asks, Master Hudson only got one artifact in Dulong Island.

"I have already obtained the artifact, but there are still many remnants of the Holy See active on the island. These people are not weak, and they hide in the dark, so there is no time to encircle and suppress them for a while.

Byron, before the fog can block your view, you send people to search around the island and destroy all the ships.

Even if it is an antique ship from hundreds of years ago, I will smash it to pieces with the magic crystal cannon. Don't let go of large pieces of wood.

The time left for us is running out, we must destroy all the navigation tools before the fog rises.

Let's put these pirates here first, I'll watch them in person, and I'll take them with me when I go back! "

Command tone, should not appear among partners. However, Hudson's status is special, and he also serves as the commander-in-chief of the Kingdom's war readiness mobilization.

A position where even he himself can't figure out the boundaries of power, the outside world is even more confused.

Whether it has the power to mobilize the country's armed forces, the capital did not give an accurate statement, but this does not affect Hudson's ordering.

"Obey, Lord Earl!"

Byron replied respectfully.

Originally, he wanted to discuss the ownership of the artifact, but he forcibly took it back when the words came to his lips. Regardless of who the artifact belongs to, it is not his turn to be a descendant of his family.

The earl's nephew did not open his mouth to talk about this issue, and he was too lazy to be the first bird.

Negotiating this kind of thing needs to pay attention to identity reciprocity. Letting them negotiate with Hudson will obviously suffer a lot.

The fleet began to perform missions, and only Viscount Cayo stayed in place with a group of guards and Hudson. In name, they helped guard the pirates, but in fact they still missed the artifact.

It's just that Hudson snatched the thing, and Kayo really didn't know what excuse to intervene to get a share of the action.

"Scepter of Glory, are you interested?"

While speaking, Hudson threw the scepter in his hand to Viscount Cayo without hesitation, as if he had lost a big trouble.

"The scepter of glory of the Holy See!"

"How can this be?"

Kayo said with a trembling voice.

As the symbol of the Holy See, the scepter of glory will appear in almost every grand ceremony. There is no news of the loss at all, but the magic wand in his hand cannot deceive anyone.

After hesitating for a while, Kayo hastily returned the scepter of glory to Hudson. This thing is really not something that the Dalton family can worry about, taking it back will only bring disaster to their own family.

"Lord Earl, you obtained this item, you can handle it yourself, we will not participate!"

Seeing this scene, Hudson pretended to be embarrassed and showed a wry smile.

"The scepter of glory is different from ordinary artifacts, and it is really too hot for our two families.

Since the Dalton family is not interested, I will send it to the capital. If His Majesty the King wants to establish a separate Holy See, this is the best legal basis. "

Caesar IV is not Caesar III, no one can be sure whether he dares to take this hot potato.

But throwing things out is better than staying in the southeast province and causing trouble for oneself. With the size of the Alpha Kingdom, as long as the king has ambitions, he can still withstand the pressure.

"Master Earl, this topic is too sensitive. There are still a group of pirates here, and it is really not suitable for discussion now!"

Viscount Kayo said in a panic.

It can be seen that he is really scared. Hudson can talk about things in an open and honest manner, because his own strength is strong enough, and he is not burdened with too many debts.

Viscount Cayo can't. Although he is a direct member of the Dalton family, he is only a "member" and not the heir of the family.

Political weight is much lower than that of Hudson. If you get involved recklessly, you might die at some point.

For the Holy See, it is very difficult to kill a dragon knight, but it is not difficult to kill a son of a great nobleman.

In political struggles, Hudson has never done things absolutely, but he is worried that he will push people into a hurry, and the other party will directly break through all political bottom lines and attack ordinary members of the Koslow family.

"Okay, the Scepter of Glory is not suitable for keeping. I will send it to the capital after dealing with the affairs on the island.

These pirate captives can only be used as coolies, they are of little value, and there is no need to subdivide them.

Simply, you and I each have half, and you can send half of the people to the mountain area afterwards. "

Hudson said calmly.

Naked conspiracy, the opportunity is given. If the Dalton family wants a piece of the pie, they just need to send someone to follow them.

The artifact cannot be given in vain, and the king will definitely compensate in other ways. The benefits are visible to the naked eye, but the risks are also close at hand.

It is uncertain how long the news can be blocked. Once it is spread, the political consequences of robbing the artifact and killing important members of the Holy See will be borne by both families.

Compared to these, some pirate captives are really not worth mentioning. For the Dalton family, these people can only be used as coolies.

The moment he took the scepter of glory, Viscount Kayo's first reaction was to silence these people.

There are only a few hundred captives in the area, and the Dalton family, which has a large family and business, does not lack this labor force.

"Your Excellency, you can decide for yourself, we will not participate.

The successful completion of this operation is mainly due to your credit. You have the right to dispose of all spoils.

Pirates captured, we will send you a lot of them to your territory afterwards. "

Viscount Cayo hastily refused.

He believed that even if his uncle was here, he would make a similar decision. If they had known that there was a scepter of glory on Dulong Island, they would not have joined in the fun no matter what.

The current situation is not to mention the loss of the family, and it may be involved in the maelstrom of the game between kingship and theocracy. If the family is not careful, the family will be photographed to pieces.

Let Hudson handle this kind of hatred. Dragon knights are rough and thick, and can withstand wind and rain, ordinary people like them can't.

In an instant, Kayo's desire for strength reached its peak. The lack of peak combat power has become the biggest shortcoming restricting the development of the Dalton family.

Not to mention the abnormality of the dragon knight, even training a few eighth-level powerhouses can increase one's own right to speak.

Of course, this is Kayo not knowing what happened on the island. If he knew that in the team sent by the Holy See this time, there were eight eighth-level powerhouses and more than twenty seventh-level powerhouses, his perception of peak powerhouses would change.

Hudson has no intention of showing off his record, and the way he wins is not in line with the aristocratic spirit.

Buying the truth forever is the best choice. When the Holy See retaliates in the future, it is better to let the Dalton family accompany them.

Purely from the statistics, there is not a single weakling in the Vatican team of more than 200 people. Obviously, it is not possible for Hudson to kill all of them with one person and two monsters.

According to the understanding of normal people, the Dalton family must have participated in the battle, and the two sides joined hands to commit the murder.

People will only believe what they see. The Dalton family fleet suffered heavy losses, and there is a high probability that the Holy See will calculate the battle losses.

"Ghost Ship", "Storm at Sea", the more legendary these legends are, the less people believe them.

The fog gradually thickened, as if it was about to cover the entire sea area, and the noisy Dulong Island became silent again.

The fleet began to slowly return home. A dragon chant pierced through the air, and Hudson had already left first.

(end of this chapter)

Chapter 401 High Weight

In the Emerald Palace, a group of bigwigs from the royal family were sizing up and down around the "Scepter of Glory", and many guys who had long died on the surface also appeared at this moment.

As the king, Caesar IV was squeezed out of place, and could only drink tea and eat melons with Hudson.

Seeing that Archbishop Tyrone was also squeezed out, Caesar IV hurried forward and asked:

"Uncle, how are you?

Is it really the Scepter of Glory? "

It's not that he made a big fuss, it's really too big.

As a symbolic artifact of the Holy See, it has been exiled, and the whole continent will be followed by a sensation when it is spread.

"Of course it is true!

If there is a problem with something, do we have to be so cautious! "

Archbishop Tyron said affirmatively.

The old antiques of the royal family cared about artifacts, but Caesar IV had to consider the political impact brought about by it.

"Earl Hudson, has the news of obtaining the scepter of glory been leaked?"

Hearing this, Hudson rolled his eyes secretly. If the news hadn't been leaked, he would have taken it privately, so how could he hand it over.

Although there is a threshold for the use of artifacts, after ten or eight years, no one is still a great magister of the light system.

Standing on a giant dragon, holding two artifacts, full of magic attack and physical attack at the same time, the scene is exciting just thinking about it.

"Your Majesty, the Dalton family was the first to discover something was wrong. I was invited to participate in this operation by Earl Pierce.

After strangling the pirates and seizing the scepter of glory, I ordered the news to be blocked.

However, there was too much movement about the birth of the artifact. During the battle, the enemy even released a forbidden spell with the artifact, which was seen by almost the entire fleet.

Although they don't know what kind of artifact it is, there are very few artifacts in the entire continent that can release the curse of the light system, and the people of the Holy See can definitely guess it.

There are still remnants of pirates on Dulong Island. Because of the fog, we have not been able to completely wipe them out.

If these people leave alive, it will be even more troublesome. "

Hudson explained perfunctorily.

Blocking the news is purely a dream, everything else can be faked, but the loss of the Dalton family fleet cannot be fooled.

Combined with the disappearance time of the "pirates" and the time when the Dalton family fleet went to sea, normal people will have associations.

Unless the entire fleet is silenced, the Holy See will be able to confirm that its inherited artifact has fallen into the hands of the Alpha Kingdom after a little investigation.

"The prime minister found an excuse to temporarily block the routes in the misty sea area by the coastal provinces. We must not allow the Holy See to obtain evidence that the scepter of glory is in our hands.

The Ministry of Military Affairs, in the name of preparing for war, summoned nobles from all over the world to discuss matters in the capital! "

Caesar IV said solemnly.

The excitement of obtaining the artifact is gone, replaced by endless anxiety in my heart.

The Kingdom of Alpha has always had the idea of ​​​​separating the Holy See. In the era of Caesar III, it clearly listed the plan and put it into action.

All kinds of branches are ready-made. As long as they announce the establishment of a separate door, the church organization of the Alpha Kingdom will be able to pull out a small Holy See immediately.

Now that he has obtained the scepter of glory, it undoubtedly makes up for the shortcomings in the jurisprudence of the separate Holy See.

Q is: bestowed by the Lord of Dawn.

According to the omnipotence of the Lord of Dawn preached by the church, the outflow of artifacts bestowed by the gods is also the will of the Lord of Dawn.

"Your Majesty, the loss of the scepter of glory is a very serious religious and political event, which directly affects the legitimacy of the contemporary pope.

No news has come out so far, and it is estimated that the bureaucrats of the Holy See dare not take responsibility.

They didn't say anything, so we pretended to be confused too.

The military action taken by the southeastern province is only to eliminate pirates and has nothing to do with the Holy See.

Whether it is to establish a separate Holy See or trade the Scepter of Glory, it will not be too late to decide after the Continental War is over. "

The prime minister, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland, persuaded.

As a member of the royal family, the first thing to consider is stability. The prospect of the continental war is unclear, and it is definitely not a good thing to anger the Holy See at this time.

"Prime Minister, you should stop being disturbed by it!

The scepter of glory involves too much, no matter whether we set up a separate sect now, the Holy See will not let it go.

It is destined to become an enemy, so it is better to take advantage of the opportunity of the continental war to bring in all the countries of the Northern Continent together.

Once we act, the Frankish Kingdom will definitely follow up. With their influence, there is no need to worry about no country following them.

The Holy See will be divided into three at least. If several other big countries have ideas, the Holy See will be divided even more.

There are new Holy See all over the place. The Holy See has to be busy stabilizing the basic market, but has no time to take revenge on us.

If the situation is serious, we will take a step back at worst, and there will be no pope for the time being after the establishment of the new Holy See. "

Archbishop Tyrone retorted.

In order to establish a separate sect, the Alpha Kingdom Church has made a lot of efforts, and now it is short of an opportunity to become independent.

If this opportunity is missed, even if it becomes independent later, it will only be a small Holy See in the region, and it will be difficult to spread its influence.

If you want to compete with the Holy See for the orthodox position of the Church of Dawn, it is even more hopeless.

If you can't seize the orthodox position, how can you meet the Lord of Dawn after you die?

In this regard, religious people are particularly persistent.

…

As a qualified melon eater, Hudson quietly watched the crowd quarrel.

From the artifact to the establishment of the Holy See, and then to this continental war, the topic is getting further and further away.

It is obvious that the opinions within the royal family cannot be unified for a while. The key now depends on which side Caesar IV supports.

However, this is far from enough. To withstand the revenge of the Holy See, it is necessary to attract a large number of nobles in the kingdom.

If possible, it is best to bring in a few more international allies to share the pressure.

The idea is beautiful, but the reality is cruel.

For the Alpha Kingdom, obtaining the Scepter of Glory at this moment is essentially picking up a hot potato.

With insufficient strength, all plans are in vain.

If you are strong enough, you can stand on your own with or without a divine weapon.

If Caesar IV is decisive enough, he should trade the Scepter of Glory in exchange for the strategic materials most needed by the kingdom.

The Kingdom of Franks, the Kingdom of Iberia, and the Kingdom of Hesse... are all good buyers, and they can also provoke conflicts between at least one major country and the Holy See.

If the Holy See can pay a sky-high price, it doesn't hurt to sell it to them.

Politics, interests come first.

Rationality is one thing, reality is another. Even though he knew how to maximize his benefits, Hudson still chose to remain silent.

Judging from the reaction of the royal family, it is obvious that they want to occupy the scepter of glory and enhance their overall strength.

"Earl Hudson, what advice do you have?"

Perhaps because everyone was arguing, Caesar IV suddenly asked.

"Your Majesty, this is a big matter. I don't have any experience in dealing with it. I'd better listen to the opinions of your seniors!"

Hudson doesn't want to participate in such an offending thing. Even if he really made a suggestion, it was impossible for Caesar IV to listen.

After all, he implicitly stated his position the first time he gave the scepter of glory.

If he agrees, as the king, he can make a decision directly instead of bringing so many people to discuss.

Obviously wanted to keep the "Scepter of Glory", but worried about causing trouble. The heart is vacillating, and more people are needed to support.

…

Late at night, the Governor's Mansion is still brightly lit.

"Kayo, are you sure the artifact that Hudson grabbed is the Scepter of Glory?"

Earl Pierce asked with concern.

The Dalton family has shown signs of decadence in recent years. The descendants of the direct descendants are weak, the high-end power of the family has suffered heavy losses, and competitors have risen strongly.

It is not easy to be able to stabilize the situation.

At the critical moment when he was about to participate in the continental war, there was another incident of artifacts, and Earl Pierce was really tired.

"Definitely! During the battle, the people of the Holy See used the power of the artifact to release a forbidden spell, and many people saw it at the time.

After the battle, Earl Hudson threw the scepter of glory to me for inspection, and it looked exactly the same as the legendary scepter of glory.

If it was a counterfeit, Hudson would have swallowed it himself, and it would be impossible to send it to the capital! "

Hearing this explanation, Earl Pierce nodded.

"It is right not to participate!

If this kind of thing gets involved, you will die.

The Holy See may not be able to deal with a dragon knight, but it is not difficult to kill him to vent his anger.

There are a bunch of lunatics in the Holy See, as long as they think they are right, they dare to do anything.

The assassination of the late emperor had the shadow of the Holy See behind it.

We have to reevaluate Hudson's strength now.

The people of the Holy See released the forbidden spell, but none of them could hurt him at all. It seems that the rumors should be true.

His dragon, even if it is not the Dragon King, is infinitely close to the Dragon King in strength.

With the addition of a bear of the earth, looking at the entire continent of Aslante, it is probably the most peak existence.

Eventful autumn! "

Earl Pierce said worriedly.

It doesn't matter if the competitor is super strong, but in the following continental war, the opponent still occupies the dominant position.

There is no way to solve the troubles within the province, and the international situation may change dramatically.

The weight of the "Scepter of Glory" is not comparable to that of the "Horn of the Blood Moon".

If it is put up for auction, tens of millions of gold coins can be sold casually. If the competition is too fierce, it is possible to exceed 100 million.

Leaving aside the religious and political value, the optical artifact itself cannot be measured by money.

Using an orthodox divine weapon requires a price, but it is far less serious than an evil weapon.

Even driving the blood moon horn once can directly **** people dry.

The white-haired old man released the forbidden spell with the scepter of glory, and was able to escape alive and well, which is enough to illustrate the gap between the two.

It is also krypton life, the evil weapon is directly finished at one time, and the artifact may consume some blood, or a few months of life.

As long as it is not overused, you can find a way to make it up.

"Uncle needn't worry, judging from what Hudson did, he shouldn't regard us as competitors.

The fleet going to sea this time suffered heavy losses, mainly due to the storm at sea after being attacked by a ghost ship.

The encirclement and suppression of the personnel of the Holy See on Dulong Island was completed independently by Hudson, and he did not use our people as cannon fodder. "

It's okay not to be comforted. After listening to Kayo's comfort, Earl Pierce became more and more depressed.

The competitor who kept him up at night didn't take him seriously. This attitude of ignorance is the greatest insult.

However, from the standpoint of the family, he can only say: more insults like this.

Being ignored by Hudson is just a matter of face; being deliberately targeted is fatal.

"Forget it, as a new great aristocrat, if Hudson wants fame, then give it to him.

It is better to have a competitive competitor than one without a bottom line.

The Koslow family has been passed down for thousands of years, and there is only one Hudson, and the overall quality of other members is far from ours.

As long as they survived the continental war, relying on the family background, it is not difficult to stabilize their position.

Send someone to inform Kick to make more contacts at the Arcane Academy, which will be of great use in the future! "

Earl Pierce said helplessly.

Although the quality of the members of the Koslow family is not very high, there are really many of them. In just two or three years, another Dalton family was born.

Just these words, Kayo could only hold back in his stomach. If you say it, it will only make the scene more embarrassing.

…

The Principality of Omega, the exciting defense of the capital has come to an end. Facing the continuous offensive of the orc army, the defenders could only retreat to the inner city for the final struggle.

In the main hall of the royal palace, everyone in the Principality wore armor one after another, waiting for the city to break through.

"Tell the people below, no matter what, we must persist until dark, this is our only way of survival!"

Baird I spoke the most embarrassing words in the most ruthless tone.

There is no such thing as living and dying with the country. A principality that was born less than three years ago has not had time to establish a sense of belonging.

Early before the orc army besieged the city, everyone moved their families out.

If it weren't for the need to give an explanation to the Race Alliance, they would have run away long ago, and it is impossible to resist until now.

From the very beginning, they planned to break out of the siege, and it is conceivable how strong the high-level resistance of the Principality of Omega is.

The ones who are really desperate are the bottom soldiers who don't know the truth.

"Don't worry, Your Majesty! We have set up a lot of traps in the city. Even if we break the city early, we can delay the time until dark."

Jefferson said confidently.

In the absence of reinforcements, the Principality of Omega has been able to persist until now, which has exceeded many people's expectations.

"snort!"

Gu Lei said calmly.

In the royal capital, looking at the data in his hand, Hudson suddenly understood why the Ministry of Military Affairs urged him to come over and preside over the overall situation every day.

As the weaker side, facing the threat of the three major alien races, what confidence does the Alpha Kingdom have to fight quickly?

"Your Excellency, you have thrown me a big trouble!"

Dare to make such a suggestion, religious people can kill him. Everyone has prepared for countless years to set up a new branch, how can you just give up if you just give up?

"Ha ha…"

"Your Excellency, Marshal, the able ones should work harder! The current situation is indeed very complicated, but with your ability, you will definitely be able to find a way to break the situation!"

Archduke Afiero said in embarrassment.

"The Principality of Omega has fallen, and the Principality of Shillong is also on the way to fall. The Kingdom of Light has lost more than half of its territory...

There are indications that the mainland countries do not support them very much. The current resistance of the seven grassland countries is only to give an explanation to the alliance.

Looking at the performance of the Principality of Omega, you can tell that the nobles not only moved their family members ahead of time, even if they evacuated at the end, they took away 5,000 troops. How many troops did they have in total?

It may not be long before they will retreat to the mountains and hold on, and give up the Warhammer Great Plains, allowing the army of the ancient survivors to gallop.

The elves are still just a rehearsal. If they also go off in person, the Duchy of Kantruo, Ustad, and Fick that are close to the Elven Forest may not be able to last for a month.

Other countries in the Northern Continent are also unable to stop the advance of the elves. Perhaps within half a year, they will be able to penetrate a road leading to the Central Continent.

"Your Excellency Marshal, you have the final say on military matters. We are only responsible for assisting from the side, and all the information of the kingdom is open to you.

"The problem of war, don't worry. Right now, let's solve the shortage of supplies first!

Relying on mountains to eat mountains, relying on water to eat water.

Coastal nobles have a natural advantage, being able to go fishing. The sea is rich in aquatic products, and there is little human damage, so it is a rare treasure.

While speaking, Hudson had already handed the list of supplies to the Grand Duke of Newfoundland.

Considering the problem of offending people, they simply took a roundabout way and directly customized a fishing mission for everyone.

He doesn't care how everyone completes the task. Anyway, when the kingdom's food production capacity is insufficient, dried fish is included in the military food system.

The mountain leaders can store thousands of tons of dried fish a year while meeting their own needs. There is no reason why other coastal nobles cannot do so.

Thinking about the overlord of the southeast coast like the Dalton family, as long as they are willing to work hard, it is not difficult at all to raise tens of thousands of tons of dried fish a year.

Lack of oil and water, these foods may not be delicious. But in the war years, being able to fill the stomach is the greatest luck, and ordinary soldiers have no qualifications to be picky.

In the case of limited resources, in order to supplement the nutritional value of the soldiers, Hudson also tried his best.

The missions of several coastal provinces are heavy, so reduce the number of their recruits and leave the labor force for fishing.

This task is only temporary. Notify the nobles in the coastal area to increase fishing efforts and store as much dried fish as possible.

Regardless of who is replaced as the commander-in-chief, the soldiers must be fed.

If the battle is fierce, maybe half a year can be finished.

Referring to the material reserves of the last war, the material targets on the list are not half of the total material reserves of the kingdom before.

Being able to support a larger-scale war with such a small amount of supplies is **** mode no matter how you look at it.

If you ask for a reduction in the total amount of supplies, the war will be impossible to fight. It is simply impossible to meet the needs of the frontline by raising materials during the war without stockpiling materials in advance.

The only difference is that the proportion of meat is higher, but it is mainly fish.

In the Alpha Kingdom, fish and meat can only be regarded as semi-meat food, not as oily as pork, beef, and mutton, and their status among the people is far inferior to that of pigs, beef, and sheep.

The main reason is that the time is too short. If there are several years of preparation time, Hudson will definitely let everyone raise poultry.

The King Chapter 403: The new official took office with three fires

When it comes to war-related issues, the efficiency of the kingdom still satisfies Hudson. After the internal discussion was completed, it was approved on the same day, and the next day it was made into an official document and sent to the provinces by the Griffin Cavalry.

Pessimistically estimated.

Of course, this set of "heresy" theories is currently Hudson's personal research and has not been disseminated to the outside world.

Although it has been done before, the samples are still too small. Among the more than 20,000 private troops in the family, there are only two to three hundred people who can compete with low-level knights through physical training.

Whether these people have different talents or the theory is really effective, more samples are needed for verification.

Hudson did everything in the standing army, not only to improve the combat effectiveness of the Kingdom's army, but also to verify his own theory.

In fact, the fact that the expenditure has not exceeded the standard is also related to the current price system of the Alpha Kingdom. The normal market is affected by the relationship between supply and demand, and the price has already soared to the sky.

But at present, the kingdom's means of production are all in the hands of the aristocratic group, and it is essentially a planned economy. The price agreed between the government and the noble lord will not change.

Once you move to a wartime economy, it's even simpler. All strategic materials are collected directly and allocated by the kingdom.

"Your Excellency Marshal, I know that your reforms have achieved great results, but the supplies are not unlimited, and it is very difficult to supply the standing army.

Once the kingdom is fully mobilized, it is simply impossible for us to provide so much meat, and the logistics will drag us down! "

The Grand Duke of Newfoundland tried to persuade.

To be honest, the daily consumption of the standing army is a terrifying figure in itself. If it is doubled again, the logistics will have to collapse.

This is determined by the upper limit of productivity, which can be reversed by non-manpower.

"Prime Minister, please rest assured that the national mobilization is a last resort. If our strategy is carried out normally, there is no need to mobilize so many people.

According to the analysis of the news from the prairie, the current orc empire is no longer the orc empire of the past. Their strength is less than half that of the peak period, and at most it is only 30-40% of the level.

As long as the materials are assembled on the front line in advance, and the training of the standing army is completed, we only need to gather another 250,000 noble elite private troops to fight them.

The number of troops mobilized is reduced, and the consumption of materials is naturally reduced.

With such an increase and a decrease, you can do the math to see whether our logistics pressure has become smaller after all.

The most important thing is that this time we are not simply defending, but to quickly defeat the Orc Empire, and then transfer the army to the Western Front. The requirements for soldiers are also greatly increased.

With such a high-intensity use of troops, if the supply standard is not raised, I am afraid that the people will be used up before the war is over! "

The perfect reason directly left the Grand Duke of Newfoundland speechless. His mind was full of "strategic needs", and even Hudson's prerequisites were ignored by him.

However, if the fight is started at the door of the house, if the battle can be resolved quickly, it is indeed possible to meet the needs of the army by relying on the materials hoarded in advance.

After hesitating for a while, the Grand Duke of Newfoundland was surprised to find that he was actually persuaded. Hudson's strategic plan is indeed very risky, but the Alpha Kingdom has no choice now.

Except that this plan is relatively reliable and has certain practicability, other people's strategic plans are even more illusory.

For example: form an army of 300,000 monsters, directly fight the orc empire, and set foot on the elf kingdom.

It's a pity that if the Alpha Kingdom wants to assemble 3,000 monster cavalry, they have to pull in underage monsters to make up the number, which is a hundred times away from the figure of 300,000.

Another example: a drunken officer proposed to send a hundred sanctuary experts to directly destroy the leader of the opponent.

Another example: A military officer who dozed off at work suggested that everyone pray together so that the Lord of Dawn will send divine punishment to destroy the enemy.

…

There is no unreliable, only more unreliable.

It's not that the officers are incompetent, it's that the kingdom's strength is too weak. Forcing everyone to ask for a plan, and they have to come up with different plans, so naturally they can only diverge their thinking.

Whether it can be realized is not important, the key is to hand over the task first. If it cannot be implemented, it is because the kingdom is not strong enough, not because there is a problem with the plan.

"Your Excellency, Marshal, are you sure you can defeat the Orc Empire with such a small force?"

The Grand Duke of Newfoundland asked in disbelief.

Living in the shadow of the orcs all the time, it was hard for him to believe that he could defeat the orc empire only by gathering 500,000 troops.

"Simply calculating military strength, such a small number of troops is naturally not enough, but wars are not simply based on military strength.

How to fight specifically, we still have to wait for the orcs to come over before we can determine the tactics. Don't worry, I know it well! "

Hudson said confidently.

Regardless of whether the plan is feasible or not, as the military commander of the kingdom, he must have confidence.

If you can't win, look for objective factors. Anyway, the Kingdom has fought the orcs so many times, and there was no time when they won by themselves alone.

…

Flander Kingdom, as the only country with a large port on the prairie, their development was smooth sailing.

Although tolls from various countries are not collected, the consumption brought by people coming and going will stimulate local consumption immediately.

Xinggang's development time is short, but in terms of prosperity, it is no less than the second-tier ports on the mainland.

Because of the importance attached to the port, the Farland Kingdom directly placed the capital in Xingang, which promoted the great development of the port.

If it wasn't for the sudden war, Xingang would be able to develop into one of the most important ports in the continent of Aslant sooner or later.

"Does the Alpha Kingdom really dare to cut off the route?"

Philip I asked in surprise.

Now is the period of the Continental War. At the critical moment when the major forces unite together to deal with alien races, it is a taboo to stab an ally.

According to the past practice, even if it is to deceive people, it is a secret method, and no one dares to openly sabotage it.

"Your Majesty, the Alpha Kingdom has never said that it will cut off the route, but only sent someone to remind us that the sea has been rough recently and there are ghost ships.

If we don't accept their terms, maybe pirates will run rampant and rob our convoy.

According to the information provided by the merchant ship, the Alpha people have indeed formed a large-scale fleet to search for traces of ghost ships at sea.

At the same time, there are also many pirates who were originally active in the coast of the Alpha Kingdom. The trajectory of their activities continues to move northward, and the final destination is likely to be the sea off Xingang.

Our fleet is too small to be a match for these pirates. The kingdom's sea route lifeline may be cut off at any time. "

Doni said with a face of embarrassment.

Weak countries have no diplomacy.

Compared to the Alpha Kingdom, the Farland Kingdom is a weak chicken, and in terms of overall strength, it is only a large province of the Alpha Kingdom.

Even if there is the support of the most powerful country in the mainland, it will not be able to quench the near thirst. If they fell out directly, before the Frankish Kingdom could spare their hands, they would be destroyed by the orcs first.

Accepting Alpha Kingdom's proposal means that their strategy to preserve their strength has failed. Even if the main force is withdrawn, it is inevitable to continue to fight the orcs.

"Your Majesty, we must carefully consider the Alpha people's proposal. The continental war has reached a stalemate, and the stimulated orcs have increased their offensive strength.

Judging from the current situation, the flames of war will reach Xingang in the second half of the year, and our evacuation plan must be started as soon as possible.

If possible, we'd better negotiate a solution to the current crisis. Perhaps you can consider asking the Frankish Kingdom to intervene.

Time is too hasty, and we have no way to withdraw all the citizens. It is also a good choice to throw those who were about to give up to the Alpha people.

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs can try their appetite, and it is worth paying some price in exchange for our evacuation.

What's more, if the future kingdom wants to be restored, it is necessary to win their support. This protection fee will be handed over sooner or later! "

Gottel gritted his teeth and said.

As the minister of military affairs, he chose to compromise, which was definitely not his original intention, but the orcs didn't give face.

Even if the two parties communicate secretly and they agree to give up most of the country, the Orc Empire is not willing to let them go.

If the strategy of slowing down the army fails, then the only option is to face the orcs head-on. In order for the allies to last a few more days, they could only send troops to help.

Although the Alpha Kingdom intends to detain them as cannon fodder, in fact similar operations have already happened on the prairie.

The Principality of Shillong and the Principality of Omega, which were the first to perish, were forcibly requisitioned when they passed by neighboring countries.

Nominally, it is temporarily borrowed for use, but in fact, everyone knows that this is a trick of borrowing without repaying.

If it wasn't for sure that they couldn't keep it, I'm afraid the refugees from the two countries would also be divided up by everyone, and they wouldn't even leave a hair for them.

He slapped the table fiercely, and Philip I, who was furious, immediately cursed: "Damn Alpha people, they are just a bunch of robbers!

I have written down this grudge!

And let them wait, our future will be..."

After a while of venting, Philip I calmed down, looked into the distance and said: "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs sent people to communicate with the Alpha Kingdom, and we can make some concessions.

Tell the Alpha people that as long as they are willing to ensure the safety of the route, refugees from the Principality of Shillong and the Principality of Omega can be given to them.

Refugees from other countries behind, as long as they enter the kingdom, we can also send them to them.

However, they need to send their own boats to pick them up, or arrange for the refugees to leave by land. We don't have extra transportation capacity for them.

If the Alpha people are determined to stay with us and negotiations cannot solve the problem, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs must also stabilize them and buy time for the family members of the kingdom's nobles to evacuate. "

…

Similar scenes are constantly being staged in the five grassland countries. It's just that everyone is facing a different situation. Even if they want to evacuate from the sea, they must borrow a way from the Farland Kingdom.

After experiencing the lessons of the Principality of Shillong and the Principality of Omega, everyone is now wary of allies. I am very worried that I will be backstabbed by my allies during the evacuation process.

The actions of the Alpha Kingdom made them even more chilled. It's fine to give up some serfs. After all, the orc army came too fast, and they didn't have the ability to evacuate all the people.

It is unbearable to keep the noble master as cannon fodder. There is nothing to say, this kind of thing must be reported to the parents!

The negative teaching material is in front of us, we must make a big deal and force the Alpha Kingdom to compromise, otherwise the future will be worrisome.

With the departure of letters asking for help, the situation in the mainland was once again stirred up. The prairie, which had been out of everyone's sight for many days, once again gathered eyes from all over the continent.

(end of this chapter)

The King Chapter 407: Inverted Alliance Council

Chapter 407 Reversed Alliance Council

There are so many officers and soldiers participating in the training, someone will always record it, and it is doomed not to keep it secret from the moment the training starts.

Even if it is plagiarism intact, the effect cannot be replicated.

The soldiers in front of me are all from the battlefield. Although most of them are from the logistics force, they have seen blood on the battlefield.

It is not as good as the previous standing army. That is because the original standing army of the kingdom is stationed on the border all year round, and has frictions with the orcs every now and then, and occasionally goes deep into the orc empire to do things.

In the case of sufficient supplies, veterans undergo rigorous training and have a high probability of being transformed into elites.

…

"Torsten, our Marshal Hudson's training is the same every day. What's so interesting?"

If I'm not mistaken, you have already sent someone back to try these training contents in the family's private army. "

Social beatings are the best way to make people grow. The hard times in recent years have made these Northland Dukes who came to power ahead of schedule grow a lot.

"hey-hey…"

"Torsten said this, as if you didn't learn it.

Marshal Hudson's training method is simple, but it is effective!

伱Looking at the teams outside the city, they are obviously different from before. It seems that he has taken over this army for less than two months, right?

What's more, the military training methods passed down by our families are actually not that complicated, and even the latter part of the content overlaps.

The difference is that our serf soldiers usually train every five days and every ten days. Only a small number of elites can train every three days. Here, they train every day.

However, Hudson is also ruthless enough to directly cut down the welfare benefits of noble officers to improve the food standards of these big soldiers.

If it weren't for his nutrition to keep up with such crazy tossing, people would have been disabled by him long ago. "

Duke Hero made complaints unabashedly.

Everyone can see the problem. Even if I can't see it, the family think tanks behind me will help analyze it, but it doesn't mean that I can follow suit.

Compared with the kingdom's standing army, it is actually more difficult for the noble private army to carry out system reforms.

A standing army belongs to the kingdom, not to someone else. In order to win the war, it is acceptable for nobles to temporarily lose part of their interests.

The family private army is different.

Because they are all on their own, they can safely hand over their backs to their companions when fighting, and they can often exert stronger combat effectiveness.

It also originated from our own people. If we want to carry out system reform, the resistance we face is also from top to bottom.

If the head of the family is strong enough, the improvement of the treatment of the soldiers can barely be implemented, but if he wants to reduce the treatment of the noble officers, then there is no need to discuss it.

Everyone is a hero of the family, so why should the salary be reduced? The head of the family has to be reasonable.

Of course, as long as there is no corruption within the family and everyone is allowed to sacrifice temporarily at a critical moment, then it is not a big problem.

However, like Hudson's reforms, these are temporary emergency measures, and once the danger is lifted, they will soon return to their original state.

"Okay, you two, there is no need to discuss Marshal Hudson's military capabilities. If you have this spare time, why not think about how to deal with the next situation!"

Duke Rodriguez said helplessly.

It seems that they hold great power at a young age and are the envy of everyone outside, but in fact they have a hard time knowing it.

The biggest shortcoming of taking the position early is the lack of prestige, and it is impossible to suppress the old guys in the clan.

He is the head of the family in name, but unfortunately because of the wrong decision made by the previous head of the family, the family has suffered heavy losses.

If it weren't for the kingdom's strict succession system, there might be a drama of side branches seizing the throne.

The power of the Patriarch was affected, no matter whether it was internally or externally, none of them could become strong.

Sometimes a decision is made, but it will be overturned in the clan, and there are more cases of obedience and violation.

If the five Northland families were at their peak, they would have jumped out to compete for the position of coach. It is definitely not that simple for Hudson to want to be in the top position.

Now let alone fight for the position of coach, they don't even have the confidence to fight for the position of deputy coach.

Even if they were nominated, they could only reluctantly refuse. There is no other reason, it is that none of them believe that they can do well.

"Rodriguez, do you think it will be our turn to control the next situation?

It is doomed to follow the general trend, so why bother yourself!

As long as the kingdom can survive this calamity smoothly, there is nothing wrong with us being the dogs of the house. "

Duke Hero said indifferently.

It's just his actual practice, which obviously doesn't match what he said. If he was really going to follow the crowd, he wouldn't be so active in stealing lessons.

It is obvious that the conversation between the few people was deliberately told to someone who cares. If you really want to discuss matters, you can't choose this heavily guarded city gate.

Since Caesar IV succeeded to the throne, they have intentionally or unintentionally moved closer to the king in order to get rid of their embarrassing political position.

As of now, the plan is half successful. Under the operation of Caesar IV, their relationship with the royal family has eased slightly, but their political isolation has not been able to change.

After all, they were still too impatient. They urgently needed to change their political status, and they couldn't hide it from the old foxes in the kingdom.

I offended so many people before, and now I want to turn around in decline, how can everyone let them relax?

Including the goodwill released by the royal family to them, it is all illusory. Caesar IV said that he would accept them, but no one knew what he thought in his heart.

After all, their ancestors ruined the royal family and lost their ancestral property, and the older generation who have personally experienced it have not died yet!

With these old antiques, the matter is not over.

Coupled with Hudson's strong rise, they lost the right to speak in the army.

In order to avoid being hit in the war, the few of them had to repeatedly express that they had no ambitions.

…

In Lutetia, the eighteenth council of the Terran Alliance kicked off.

It has been less than two years since the last meeting closed, making it look like a permanent institution.

There is no way. There are too many things that need to be coordinated by all parties in the outbreak of the continental war, and there must be a meeting to discuss it.

The delay in the opening was mainly due to the fact that the last meeting had just ended, and it seemed very cheap to hold another meeting immediately.

National countries do not want to start this "historical name". When encountering problems, representatives of all parties discuss and deal with them in private, until representatives of the five grassland countries jointly initiate a proposal.

The problem was brought to the alliance meeting, which was obviously the result of the breakdown of the negotiation.

What is surprising is that Charles III, who loves the limelight, is "at home sick" at the moment, and instead of coming to join in the fun, he let the prime minister, Duke Bergson, preside over the meeting as the representative of the host.

…

"Count Predrag, what is your country's opinion on the joint complaint of the Kingdom of Farland, the Kingdom of Ita, the Kingdom of Light, the Duchy of Gamma, and the Duchy of Delta?"

Duke Bergson asked seriously.

As for threatening countries to withdraw their troops to our country and using them as cannon fodder, it is even more blatant slander!

Such a shameless thing can only be done by a rogue country.

I don't know how some people's brains are so long. We only reminded us of the strong wind and waves at sea once, but we made up so many pictures in our brains.

I'm afraid it's an excuse deliberately fabricated by some people who are greedy for life and afraid of death, and want to be deserters in front of the battle.

Anyone with a little common sense knows that if the countries on the grassland fall, there are only two evacuation routes for the people.

The few boats on the sea are not enough for some selfish deserters, so where are the boat tickets for ordinary civilians?

Our country's willingness to accept refugees is due to the noble spirit of responsibility and compassion for the weak...

These slanders appear mainly because we are unwilling to accept cowards who flee without fighting.

These scum who enjoyed the glory of the nobles and were unwilling to take responsibility, fabricated these accusations in order to avenge the kingdom! "

Politics, thick-skinned, eat enough.

No matter how much the five grassland countries accuse, they are all things that haven't happened yet. As long as the Alpha Kingdom bites dead and refuses to admit it, it is impossible to convict the crime.

When the original proposal was issued, the Five Nations did not expect to do anything to the Alpha Kingdom. They just wanted to create pressure from public opinion and force the Alpha people to give up their plan to use them as cannon fodder.

It's a pity that a storm of public opinion has been created, but the direction of the wind is not right. The Alpha Kingdom, which should have been blamed for being busy explaining, directly bit them back.

"Deserter", a seemingly simple word, was a heinous crime during the Continental War.

Once they fall, even if they evacuate from the grassland intact, there will be no place for them on the mainland.

The relatives, friends, and family members of the past will be ashamed of them, and even the family behind them will be ashamed.

"Count Predrag, you are completely slandering!"

"It's all slander!"

"We are busy fighting **** the front line, and you are watching the excitement in the rear, deliberately sitting and watching..."

…

Watching the representatives of the five countries continue to file complaints, the smile on Earl Predrag's face became brighter and brighter.

The other party panicked so quickly, there is only one explanation: they are really planning to run away!

Now that it has been dismantled, it will undoubtedly seriously affect the evacuation plan of the five countries. If the movement range is a little bigger, it will cause an uproar.

The window paper was pierced, even if there was a chance to withdraw the main force, they dare not implement it now.

If tens of thousands or hundreds of thousands of people were to be evacuated from the sea, the spittle stars within the human race alone would be able to drown them, let alone restore the country.

"Whether there is any slander, everyone knows in their hearts that many congressmen present here are not blind.

In recent days, there are so many of you returning home to visit your relatives!

Now is a time of war, and all resources should be tilted towards war. Tens of thousands of people return home every month to visit their relatives. It seems that your war potential is quite large.

Talking about using allies as cannon fodder, I think the representatives of the Principality of Shillong and the Principality of Omega will have something to say.

After all, the tens of thousands of troops that broke out from the two countries are now less than five hundred, and they are short of sending their king to the battlefield.

We are also afraid of being tricked when we meet your low morals and allies who want to be deserters!

Everyone can rest assured that the kingdom will take over when needed, who made us and the orcs enemies! "

Forcibly defending, but it sounds like everyone still thinks it makes sense.

It's just that for this kind of thing, everyone usually turns a blind eye to it, and no one wants to do it right.

All members of the House of Representatives here know about cheating teammates. When the incident happened, the two victims of the Principality of Shillong and the Principality of Omega also approached everyone to uphold justice.

It's a pity that the reasons for the Five Kingdoms of the Grassland are very good, all in order to resist the invasion of orcs. In addition, it was only forcibly expropriated at that time, and it had not been used as cannon fodder, and everyone could not be convicted in advance.

After the incident, both the Principality of Shillong and the Principality of Omega were left blank, and even the investors behind them chose to admit their losses, so naturally no one would stand up for them.

It is determined that there is no way to recover, and the representatives of the two countries in the parliament are too lazy to do useless work and start their retirement career in advance.

At this moment, Earl Predrag's words pushed them to the foreground again.

"Your Excellency Earl is right, our two countries just mistrusted five shameless allies, and even lost the last seed of the principality.

Even our king is under house arrest. And use this as a threat to prevent us from appealing to the Alliance Council!

Due to His Majesty's safety, we can only choose to compromise.

Today finally let us wait for the opportunity to speak, in front of many congress representatives, I don't believe you dare to kill the king! "

"Dog thief, today we want to seek justice for the dead souls of the Principality!"

The accusations of the Earl of Carliss and the Earl of Houston instantly brought the atmosphere of the venue to a climax.

"Cut off the route", "Sit back and watch the allies defeat", "Desert soldiers", "Use allies as cannon fodder", each topic is already sensitive enough, and now a "house arrest monarchy case" has been involved.

If any accident happened to Borent I and Baird I, there would be a regicide case immediately.

The incident became more and more troublesome, and the congressmen who had been watching the excitement gradually couldn't sit still.

The previous issues are easy to talk about. After the sexual war is settled, the responsibility of the country concerned can be slowly investigated, but the regicide case must not happen under their noses.

Even if it is only a possibility, it is not allowed.

The atmosphere in the silent venue was terribly oppressive. The representatives of the five grassland countries who were forced to the corner hurriedly came out to explain.

It's a pity that they were interrupted by Duke Bergson as soon as they spoke.

"I don't care what kind of grievances there are among the seven grassland countries, such things as house arrest of the monarchs of other countries are not allowed.

Trying to kill the king in vain is a heinous crime!

I propose that the alliance send a fleet to bring back Borent I and Baird I. During this period, you must ensure the safety of the two majesties.

The rest of the issues, after the two Majesties arrive in Lutetia, we will hold a meeting to discuss. "

It seems that Duke Bergson is suppressing the five steppe countries, but he is actually saving the field.

If the discussion continues, not to mention forcing the Alpha Kingdom to give up its plan, maybe the Five Grassland Kingdoms will become suspects of regicide first.

The Five Prairie Kingdoms are still politically immature after all, and it would be a big failure to bring something that hasn't happened to the Alliance Parliament.

But his own **** is not clean, and he left people with a handle on the issue of the Principality of Shillong and the Principality of Omega. How could the Alpha Kingdom give up this opportunity?

The alliance meeting had just begun, and the five grassland countries were directly defeated.

To put it bluntly, none of the crimes they sued the Alpha Kingdom had had time to happen. On the contrary, they themselves were charged with the same crime.

If it weren't for Duke Bergson's timely rescue, it is estimated that within a few days, the Alliance Council will be able to receive the news of the assassination of Borent I and Baird I.

At that time, the five grassland countries will become coal, and even jumping into the sea will not be able to clear up the suspicion.

With the addition of multiple crimes, any actions taken by the Alpha Kingdom against them will become legal.

Even now, their identities have changed from plaintiffs to defendants.

At this moment, their problem is not how to accuse the Alpha Kingdom of crimes, but how to make the Alpha Kingdom let go.

Chapter 408 I may not believe it, but you must believe it

The Frankish Royal Palace.
